snippet: The defendant was captured on a plane bound for Detroit from Amsterdam in 2009 and accused of trying to ignite a bomb hidden in his underwear.
lead_paragraph: The defendant was captured on a plane bound for Detroit from Amsterdam in 2009 and accused of trying to ignite a bomb hidden in his underwear.

headline.main: Jury Sought for Nigerian Held in Bid to Bomb Jet
headline.print_headline: Jury Sought For Nigerian Held in Bid To Bomb Jet
headline.seo: Abdulmutallab Trial Opens With Jury Selection
